entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
